definitions.body: music (of stringed instr.) acc. cogn. Is 38:20; as occupation La 5:14; esp. [[בִּנְגִינוֹת]] in Psalm-titles; Ps 4:1, Ps 6:1, Ps 54:1, Ps 55:1, Ps 67:1, Ps 76:1; so Hb Hab 3:19; cf. [[עַל־נְגִינַת]] Ps 61:1 (rd. perh. pl. Ges:§ 80 f.).
